meta.title: No Lie with Brian Tyler Cohen
meta.description: No Lie covers the most important and breaking political stories of the week, hosted by progressive commentator Brian Tyler Cohen. He sits down with major players in the world of politics, bringing you right into the heart of the action. No bad faith talking points, no disinformation, and no lies.

meta.author: Brian Tyler Cohen
meta.summary: No Lie covers the most important and breaking political stories of the week, hosted by progressive commentator Brian Tyler Cohen. He sits down with major players in the world of politics, bringing you right into the heart of the action. No bad faith talking points, no disinformation, and no lies.

episodes.title: Beto O’Rourke on the long-awaited question of his next run
episodes.description:
Republicans desperately try to pivot away from talking about the cause of the protests, Trump disgraces the memory of George Floyd with an unreal stunt, and Beto O’Rourke discusses Texas' role as what is now the most-watched state in the nation for the 2020 election with Trump and Biden TIED in polling—as well as answers the long-awaited question about his OWN political future.

Written by Brian Tyler Cohen

Produced by Sam Graber

Music by Wellsy

Recorded in Los Angeles, CA

https://www.briantylercohen.com/podcast/

 

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

episodes.title: Trump’s vote-by-mail suppression is working. On Republicans.
episodes.description:
Trump might have just inadvertently sunk his own re-election with his attacks on mail-in voting, there were some can't-miss developments in the US Senate races, and I sit down with Joe Biden’s chief of staff, who was also responsible for overseeing the US response to the Ebola pandemic during the Obama administration, Ron Klain, who pinpoints Trump's COVID-19 failures with surgical precision.

Welcome to the premiere episode of No Lie with Brian Tyler Cohen. Subscribe for more!

Written by Brian Tyler Cohen

Produced by Sam Graber

Music by Wellsy

Recorded in Los Angeles, CA

 

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Welcome to the premiere episode of No Lie with Brian Tyler Cohen. Subscribe for more! Written by Brian Tyler Cohen Produced by Sam Graber Music by Wellsy Recorded in Los Angeles, CA

episodes.title: Trailer
episodes.description:
No Lie with Brian Tyler Cohen - Coming June 1

Subscribe now!

After a billion views online, progressive host Brian Tyler Cohen is finally hosting a podcast. Get ready for a deep dive into the issues you care about and one-on-one interviews with major players in the world of politics.

Subscribe now so you don't miss an episode.

No Lie will cover the most important and breaking political stories of the week, hosted by progressive commentator Brian Tyler Cohen.

He'll also sit down with major players in the world of politics, bringing you right into the heart of the action. No bad faith talking points, no disinformation, and no lies.

Subscribe today! Never miss an episode when No Lie launches.

Written by Brian Tyler Cohen

Produced by Sam Graber

Recorded in Los Angeles, CA

 

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
